review: Definitely worth the price! I own both the Amazon Fire TV and Stick, as well as a Roku 2 XS and Apple TV. I have streamed on all these devices as well as various TV apps and Dvd apps etc, and I can state without doubt that both Amazon Fire devices are far superior to the rest. By superior, I'm referring to speed, audio and video quality etc... I highly recommend either device.
author: Steve Little

review: I wish more more movies form the 50's & 60's had "Prime" status.
author: Stephen Roka

review: Absolutely love my amazon fire stick!!!
author: Terra Martoccia

review: Plug it in and get out of the way!!!
author: Robert C. Johnson

review: It will be perfect when HBOGo is added!
author: Amazon Customer

review: I have only had it a few days but I am impressed with how easy it was to set up and use. I don't have a wii or blue ray player to watch Netflix so this was a perfect simple solution for my simple tv watching lifestyle. I am sure it can do more than I will use it for but for the price and ease its perfect!
author: Chelsea Toone

review: Great product took less than 5 minutes to install.
author: DAE

review: I loved it. So much better than Chromecast. Really worth buying.
author: sarvagya
